titleStmt.title: A Lamentation in tender bowels of love over thee, Oh England that thou mayst return to the Lord in humility and seek him, yet while he may be found / [by] Ambrose Rigge.
titleStmt.author: Rigge, Ambrose, 1635?-1705.
